name: Shadow Warriors
overview: SHADOW WARRIORS, the latest, greatest and most ambitious martial arts coin-op game now rages onto your computer - featuring interactive scenic backdrops! The secrets of the Ninjitsu assassination techniques have been handed down since the Medieval wars.. now they live on in the jungle of the American metropolis. A thousand years of the Ninjitsu secrets at your fingertips.. the Phoenix backflip, Triple Blow Combination, Flying Neck Throw, Hang Kick and more, give you a formidable armoury of stunning moves. Take your techniques to the streets. SHADOW WARRIOR.. the hero of the nineties!
